thread.title: Lily-Rose Depp Puts a Youthful Spin on a Vintage Fashion Favorite - Vogue
thread.title_full: Lily-Rose Depp Puts a Youthful Spin on a Vintage Fashion Favorite - Vogue

title: Lily-Rose Depp Puts a Youthful Spin on a Vintage Fashion Favorite - Vogue
text: Lily-Rose Depp Puts a Youthful Spin on a Vintage Fashion Favorite February 23, 2017 1:40 AM by Maria Ward Photo: AKM-GSI At 17 years old, Lily-Rose Depp has a very grown-up approach to fashion. While most teens are focused on the latest trends, or whatever the kids are into these days, Depp is always expanding her wardrobe to include a mix of vintage designer threads, too. We recently saw supermodel Kendall Jenner at London’s coolest thrift store, fittingly dressed in a retro red fringed jacket , and now it seems that Depp is continuing the throwback movement in Paris. Seen earlier today en route to the Chanel showroom for a Fall 2017 runway fitting, Depp covered up in a vintage Courrèges motorcycle look with a subtle ladylike twist. Depp carried a quilted Chanel bag in canary yellow with gold hardware detail that recalled the vanity boxes of a decade past, furthermore adding a pop of contrast and plenty of It accessory status. Depp did well to layer her statement-making outerwear over a simple camel knit sweater that didn’t detract from the color-block message up top. Sleek black trousers and a pair of ankle boots with a sturdy block heel placed the look on solid, stylish ground. Here’s hoping her fellow youths will follow suit. Recommended For You
